# Pew 2008

```{r, eval = T, echo = TRUE, include = FALSE}

## Load data.
hi <- c(1, 2, 3)
for (i in 1:len(hi)){
    print(hi[i])
}

```

```{python, eval = T, echo = TRUE}
hi = [1, 2, 3]
for number in hi:
    print(number)

```
